de.bitbrain.braingdx.input

Interface GameInputAdapter.GameInputListener

  • Enclosing class:
    GameInputAdapter

    public static interface GameInputAdapter.GameInputListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSwipe(int deltaX, int deltaY)
      Is called whenever the user has initiated a strong enough swipe.
      void onTouch()
      Is called whenever the user touches but does not swipe
      void onType(int key)
      Is called whenever the user types

    • Method Detail

      • onSwipe

        void onSwipe(int deltaX,
           int deltaY)
        Is called whenever the user has initiated a strong enough swipe.
        Parameters:
        deltaX - the horizontal distance swiped
        deltaY - the vertical distance swiped

      • onTouch

        void onTouch()
        Is called whenever the user touches but does not swipe

      • onType

        void onType(int key)
        Is called whenever the user types
        Parameters:
        key - code defined by Input.Keys
